meanings.sent1: She outclombed her friends in reaching the top of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The determined squirrel outclombed all others to get to the acorns first.
meanings.sent3: The little spider outclombed the raindrops by quickly scaling down its web.
meanings.sent4: His ambition to outclomb his fears led him to conquer the highest peak.
meanings.sent5: The mountain goat outclombed the steep cliffs with ease.

meanings.sent1: He outclombed his brother by reaching the top of the ladder first.
meanings.sent2: The monkey outclombed the tourists to grab the bananas hanging above.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to outclomb the dog, but the leash held it back.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outclomb her limitations pushed her to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The spider outclombed the fly, climbing up the wall to catch its prey.

meanings.sent1: The adventurous hiker outclomb the treacherous mountain pass.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel outclomb the tree branch to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent3: The spider outclomb the rain gutter to build its web under the eaves.
meanings.sent4: The mountaineer outclomb the snowy peak, reaching the summit at last.
meanings.sent5: The determined climber outclomb the rocky cliff, finding a hidden cave above.
